full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA @007B NAS BRGYUD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG SANG RANG PHYOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG THUN MONG MA YIN 'DI 'DRA YOD BZHIN DU, ,DE LAS ZAB PA'I SENG GDONG MA'I MAN NGAG ZHIG GZHAN 'JUG PA MTHONG ZHING, RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG 'DI LA YANG, GLONGS BSHAGS, ,BSRUNG BZLOG ,TSOGS BRGYA, ME MCHOD SOGS RNYING LUGS KYI RGYAL 'DEBS SNA TSOGS PAS BSKAD PAR BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MTHONG NAS, RANG LUGS GTZANG SID DE BA'I YIG CHA ZHIG 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG ,NYE CHAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR DU PHA ROL GYI BSAM NGAN PA'I MTHU GTANG SOGS KYI LTAS MTSAN BYUNG BA BZLOG CHED DU, ,SENG GDONG MA DANG, CHA LUGS KHRO RGYAL GTZUG TOR 'BAR BA GNYIS KYIS GTZO BO'I PHYIR BZLOG GI SGRUB PA KHAG 'GA' ZHIG 'DZUG 'DUN SKABS, ,KLAG CHOG 'DI LTA BU NYER 'KHOR 'DUG TSUL 'GA' ZHIG GIS MOS PA LA BRTEN NAS, ,BTZUN GZUGS ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RJE LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG, ,RGYAL DBANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD @008A *, ,PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO RKYANG GI SGRUB THABS DANG, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS GONG 'OG BSGRIGS TE GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON 'GRUB PO,, ,,)
